mapper.select: SELECT c.*, i.name AS ingredientName, i.price, i.image, i.unit FROM cart_items c JOIN ingredients i ON c.ingredient_id = i.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM cart_items WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND ingredient_id = #{ingredientId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_items (user_id, ingredient_id, quantity, added_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{ingredientId}, #{quantity}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE cart_items SET quantity = #{quantity} WHERE id = #{id}
